name.value: Nictiz Geboortezorg - Server - Scenario 1 - Serve resources for current pregnancy - JSON Format

description.value: OAuth Token for current patient
Test Server query operation for Woman (Patient)
Test Server query operation for Woman (Patient)
Confirm that the operation was succesful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome contain a meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that literal References (Reference.reference) are an absolute URL, a relative URL or an internal fragment reference (contained), see: http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/references.html#literal.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().reference.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or startsWith('#') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or (startsWith('urn:').not() and startsWith('#').not() and matches('^[A-Za-z]{3,}/[^/]+$')) )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2019.01_FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2019.01_FHIR_IG#Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that literal References (Reference.reference) are an absolute URL, a relative URL or an internal fragment reference (contained), see: http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/references.html#literal.

expression.value: Bundle.descendants().reference.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or startsWith('#') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') or (startsWith('urn:').not() and startsWith('#').not() and matches('^[A-Za-z]{3,}/[^/]+$')) )

description.value: Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2019.01_FHIR_IG#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.
Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/MedMij:V2019.01_FHIR_IG#Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
